title: unnaiyanri urutuNai
sahitya:
unnaiyanri urutuNai illai annai paNNAri aruL migum mAri


anupallavi

  ennaik-kai viDal enna nItiyO unnaruL surakka uLattinil kuraiyO


caraNam 1    innisaiyAl inidE tudittEn idayattil unnai iruttiyE vaittEn
kaNNai imai pOl kAttiDa nOkku kalangiDum endan kavalaiyai nIkku
    caraNam 2    mantra gItam maraiyoli muzhanga maNTapam uraiyum mangaLa selvi
sindura sevvAi sirippinaik-kATTu sundarak-karattAl tuyarinai OTTu
